definition: To contain something as a part of something else.
example: The report includes several recommendations.
example_translation: Raport zawiera kilka zaleceń.

definition: To make a decision or judgment after considering something.
example: After discussing the issue, they reached a conclusion.
example_translation: Po omówieniu sprawy doszli do wniosku.

definition: To bring something to an end.
example: The meeting concluded at 10 PM.
example_translation: Spotkanie zakończyło się o 22:00.

definition: Specific or special.
example: In this particular case, we need more evidence.
example_translation: W tym szczególnym przypadku potrzebujemy więcej dowodów.

definition: For example.
example: Many birds migrate, for instance, geese and swans.
example_translation: Wiele ptaków migruje, na przykład gęsi i łabędzie.

definition: With the purpose of achieving something.
example: In order to pass the exam, you need to study hard.
example_translation: W celu zdania egzaminu musisz się dużo uczyć.

definition: Taking into account.
example: Considering the circumstances, he did well.
example_translation: Biorąc pod uwagę okoliczności, poradził sobie dobrze.

definition: To be the parts or components of something.
example: These documents constitute the entire agreement.
example_translation: Te dokumenty stanowią całą umowę.

definition: A way of doing something.
example: The best course of action is to consult a lawyer.
example_translation: Najlepszy sposób działania to skonsultować się z prawnikiem.

definition: To be more important than something else.
example: The benefits outweigh the risks.
example_translation: Korzyści przeważają nad ryzykiem.

definition: Disadvantages or negative aspects.
example: Despite its drawbacks, the plan was approved.
example_translation: Pomimo wad plan został zatwierdzony.

definition: Thinking carefully about.
example: Weighing up all the options, they decided to go ahead.
example_translation: Rozważając wszystkie opcje, zdecydowali się kontynuować.

definition: Ideas, opinions or pieces of information that have been presented in relation to the topic.
example: The points raised during the meeting were noted.
example_translation: Poruszone kwestie podczas spotkania zostały zanotowane.

definition: Extremely careful and thorough.
example: The research was conducted in a rigorous manner.
example_translation: Badania przeprowadzono w rygorystyczny sposób.

definition: To reach an answer by thinking carefully about the known facts.
example: From the evidence, we can deduce that he is guilty.
example_translation: Z dowodów możemy dedukować, że jest winny.

definition: Reliable and able to stand up to close examination.
example: The new model is more robust and reliable.
example_translation: Nowy model jest bardziej solidny i niezawodny.

definition: Completely and firmly.
example: The proposal was soundly rejected.
example_translation: Propozycja została solidnie odrzucona.

definition: Considering or remembering something when judging a situation.
example: Taking into account his experience, he was the best candidate.
example_translation: Biorąc pod uwagę jego doświadczenie, był najlepszym kandydatem.

definition: Important parts or features of a problem or situation.
example: We need to focus on the relevant aspects of the case.
example_translation: Musimy skupić się na istotnych aspektach sprawy.

definition: The systematic investigation into and study of materials and sources to establish facts and reach new conclusions.
example: The research took two years to complete.
example_translation: Badania zajęły dwa lata.

definition: People of the same age, status, or ability as others in a group.
example: Students were encouraged to discuss their work with their peers.
example_translation: Studentów zachęcano do dyskusji na temat swojej pracy z osobami z tego samego kręgu.

definition: The process of making judgments based on evidence and reasoning.
example: Drawing conclusions from the data was challenging.
example_translation: Wyciąganie wniosków z danych było trudne.

definition: Taking into account.
example: Considering the situation, we should act now.
example_translation: Biorąc pod uwagę sytuację, powinniśmy działać teraz.

definition: To decide firmly in favor of one option or side.
example: After much debate, he came down on one side.
example_translation: Po wielu debatach opowiedział się po jednej stronie.

word: Tip the scales in favor of
definition: To cause a situation to change in favor of someone or something.
example: Her testimony tipped the scales in favor of the defendant.
example_translation: Jej zeznania przechyliły szalę na korzyść oskarżonego.

definition: To indicate or suggest something.
example: All the evidence points to his involvement.
example_translation: Wszystkie dowody wskazują na jego udział.

definition: A state of dissatisfaction, disturbance, and agitation.
example: The political unrest led to widespread protests.
example_translation: Niepokój polityczny doprowadził do powszechnych protestów.

definition: An understanding of the true nature of something.
example: Her insights into the market were invaluable.
example_translation: Jej spostrzeżenia dotyczące rynku były bezcenne.

definition: The people engaged in or available for work.
example: The company is looking to expand its workforce.
example_translation: Firma chce zwiększyć swoją siłę roboczą.

definition: Correctly or satisfactorily.
example: Make sure the equipment is working properly.
example_translation: Upewnij się, że sprzęt działa prawidłowo.

word: Come down on one/be in favor of one/see both sides of an argument

definition: A long essay on a particular subject, especially one written for a university degree or diploma.
example: She completed her dissertation on climate change.
example_translation: Ukończyła rozprawę naukową na temat zmiany klimatu.

definition: The available body of facts or information indicating whether a belief or proposition is true or valid.
example: The evidence clearly shows he was guilty.
example_translation: Dowody wyraźnie pokazują, że był winny.

definition: In a way that expresses or involves an analysis of the merits and faults of a work.
example: He critically examined the data.
example_translation: Krytycznie przeanalizował dane.

definition: An evaluation of a work or performance.
example: The critical review of the movie was positive.
example_translation: Krytyczna recenzja filmu była pozytywna.

definition: The expression of disapproval of someone or something based on perceived faults or mistakes.
example: She received a lot of criticism for her decision.
example_translation: Otrzymała wiele krytyki za swoją decyzję.

definition: The objective analysis and evaluation of an issue in order to form a judgment.
example: Critical thinking is essential for problem-solving.
example_translation: Krytyczne myślenie jest niezbędne do rozwiązywania problemów.

definition: Expressing adverse or disapproving comments or judgments.
example: He was highly critical of the new policy.
example_translation: Był bardzo krytyczny wobec nowej polityki.

definition: Discovered, especially something that has been buried or hidden.
example: They unearthed an old manuscript.
example_translation: Odkryli stary rękopis.

definition: Political moods or trends are changing.
example: The political winds are blowing in a different direction now.
example_translation: Polityczne nastroje zmieniają się teraz w innym kierunku.

definition: A large number of protests.
example: The decision sparked a storm of protest.
example_translation: Decyzja wywołała falę protestów.

definition: Researching or looking into historical records.
example: By digging into the archives, they found the original documents.
example_translation: Poprzez badanie archiwów, znaleźli oryginalne dokumenty.

definition: To provide a new or different understanding of a situation.
example: The new evidence sheds new perspective on the case.
example_translation: Nowe dowody rzucają nowe światło na sprawę.

definition: A brief account of a person's education, qualifications, and previous occupations, typically sent with a job application.
example: Please attach your curriculum vitae to the application.
example_translation: Proszę załączyć swój życiorys do aplikacji.

definition: An occupation undertaken for a significant period of a person's life and with opportunities for progress.
example: She plans to pursue a career in law.
example_translation: Planuje rozwijać karierę w dziedzinie prawa.

definition: Goals or aims that someone is trying to achieve.
example: The objectives of the project are clear.
example_translation: Cele projektu są jasne.

definition: Information required to communicate with someone, such as address, phone number, and email.
example: Please provide your contact details.
example_translation: Proszę podać swoje dane kontaktowe.

definition: A desired position or achievement that one aims for in their professional life.
example: My career goal is to become a manager.
example_translation: Moim celem kariery jest zostanie menedżerem.

definition: To list or highlight abilities and proficiencies one possesses.
example: In your CV, mention skills relevant to the job.
example_translation: W swoim CV wymień umiejętności istotne dla tej pracy.

definition: To incorporate or add details of one's educational and professional credentials.
example: Make sure to include qualifications in your resume.
example_translation: Upewnij się, że w swoim CV uwzględniłeś kwalifikacje.

definition: Practical contact with and observation of facts or events.
example: He has five years of experience in marketing.
example_translation: Ma pięcioletnie doświadczenie w marketingu.

definition: Things done successfully, typically by effort, courage, or skill.
example: Her achievements in the field are impressive.
example_translation: Jej osiągnięcia w tej dziedzinie są imponujące.

definition: Hobbies or activities that are pertinent to the job or field.
example: List any relevant interests on your resume.
example_translation: Wymień istotne zainteresowania w swoim CV.

definition: Important words or phrases related to a particular subject or job.
example: Use appropriate keywords to enhance your resume.
example_translation: Użyj odpowiednich słów kluczowych, aby wzmocnić swoje CV.

definition: Selected or chosen by someone.
example: The candidates were picked out by the hiring manager.
example_translation: Kandydaci zostali wybrani przez kierownika ds. rekrutacji.

definition: Statements that represent something as better or worse than it really is.
example: Avoid exaggerations in your resume.
example_translation: Unikaj przesady w swoim CV.

definition: Giving a lot of information clearly and in a few words.
example: A resume should be clear and concise.
example_translation: CV powinno być jasne i zwięzłe.

definition: The way in which text or pictures are set out on a page.
example: The layout of your resume is important.
example_translation: Układ twojego CV jest ważny.

definition: Interesting and exciting.
example: He found the new project stimulating.
example_translation: Nowy projekt okazał się dla niego stymulujący.

translation: ugruntowany/taki, który istnieje od jakiegoś czasu
definition: One that has existed for some time.
example: They have an established reputation in the industry.
example_translation: Mają ugruntowaną reputację w branży.

definition: Producing new ideas.
example: Creativity is essential for this role.
example_translation: Kreatywność jest niezbędna w tej roli.

definition: Ability to manage people and lead them in new directions.
example: He demonstrated strong leadership skills.
example_translation: Wykazał się silnymi zdolnościami przywódczymi.

definition: The process of maintaining or preserving something.
example: Regular maintenance is required.
example_translation: Wymagana jest regularna obsługa techniczna.

definition: Able to speak two languages.
example: She is bilingual in English and Spanish.
example_translation: Ona jest dwujęzyczna - mówi po angielsku i hiszpańsku.

definition: Working independently, not as a company employee.
example: He works as a freelance graphic designer.
example_translation: Pracuje jako niezależny grafik.

definition: Giving (something, especially money) in order to help achieve or provide something.
example: She is contributing to the team's success.
example_translation: Ona przyczynia się do sukcesu zespołu.

definition: To supply or make available.
example: All necessary materials will be provided.
example_translation: Wszystkie niezbędne materiały będą dostarczone.

definition: A letter sent with, and explaining the contents of, another document or a parcel of goods.
example: Please include a cover letter with your application.
example_translation: Proszę załączyć list motywacyjny do swojej aplikacji.

definition: A file sent with an email message.
example: I have included my resume as an attachment.
example_translation: Załączyłem swoje CV jako załącznik.

definition: An email that accompanies another document to explain its content or context.
example: Send your resume and a cover email.
example_translation: Wyślij swoje CV i email motywacyjny.

definition: A job or role within a company.
example: She applied for a managerial position.
example_translation: Aplikowała na stanowisko menedżerskie.

definition: A phrase used to introduce the subject of the letter or email.
example: I am writing with reference to your job advertisement.
example_translation: Piszę z referencjami do waszego ogłoszenia o pracę.

definition: A phrase used to point out something in the attached documents or previous communications.
example: As you will see in my resume, I have extensive experience.
example_translation: Jak widać w moim CV, mam duże doświadczenie.

definition: A resume that is included with a letter or email.
example: Please find my attached CV for your consideration.
example_translation: W załączeniu przesyłam swoje CV do rozważenia.

definition: A summary of one's professional and educational history.
example: My background includes five years in marketing.
example_translation: Moje doświadczenie obejmuje pięć lat w marketingu.

definition: At a recent time; not long ago.
example: I recently graduated from university.
example_translation: Ostatnio ukończyłem studia.

word: I would now like to relocate
definition: A phrase indicating a desire to move to a different location for work.
example: I would now like to relocate to New York.
example_translation: Chciałbym się teraz przenieść do Nowego Jorku.

definition: A phrase indicating when one is ready to start a job or attend an interview.
example: I am available for an interview at your earliest convenience.
example_translation: Jestem dostępny na rozmowę kwalifikacyjną w dogodnym dla Państwa terminie.

word: I look forward to hearing from you
definition: A polite phrase indicating that one is anticipating a response.
example: I look forward to hearing from you soon.
example_translation: Czekam na wiadomość od Ciebie wkrótce.

definition: A formal sign-off used at the end of a letter.
example: Yours sincerely, John Doe
example_translation: Z poważaniem, John Doe

definition: Using few words; not including extra or unnecessary information.
example: Please write concisely.
example_translation: Proszę pisać zwięźle.

definition: A number of different people applying for a job.
example: The job attracted various candidates.
example_translation: Praca przyciągnęła różnych kandydatów.

definition: Undoubtedly; definitely; with certainty.
example: I will certainly attend the meeting.
example_translation: Z pewnością wezmę udział w spotkaniu.

definition: To leave school or an organization before completion.
example: He dropped out of college to start his own business.
example_translation: Odpadł z uczelni, aby założyć własny biznes.

definition: Chosen or selected from a group.
example: She was picked out for her excellent performance.
example_translation: Została wybrana za swoje doskonałe wyniki.

definition: Successful in producing a desired or intended result.
example: The new marketing strategy proved to be very effective.
example_translation: Nowa strategia marketingowa okazała się bardzo skuteczna.

definition: Consistently good in quality or performance; able to be trusted.
example: He is known for his reliable methods.
example_translation: Jest znany ze swoich niezawodnych metod.

definition: Available as another possibility or choice.
example: They are exploring alternative solutions to the problem.
example_translation: Poszukują alternatywnych rozwiązań problemu.

definition: Occurring, found, or done often; prevalent.
example: It is a common practice in many industries.
example_translation: To powszechna praktyka w wielu branżach.

definition: Existing in or as part of a tradition; long-established.
example: The festival follows a traditional method of celebration.
example_translation: Festiwal odbywa się według tradycyjnej metody świętowania.

definition: An established or official way of doing something.
example: The procedure must be followed exactly.
example_translation: Procedura musi być dokładnie przestrzegana.

definition: A scientific procedure to make a discovery, test a hypothesis, or demonstrate a known fact.
example: They conducted an experiment to test the theory.
example_translation: Przeprowadzili eksperyment, aby przetestować teorię.

definition: A small scale preliminary study conducted to evaluate feasibility, time, cost, risk, and adverse events.
example: A pilot study was conducted before the main research.
example_translation: Przed głównymi badaniami przeprowadzono badania pilotażowe.

definition: A method of gathering information from individuals, usually by asking questions.
example: The survey revealed surprising results.
example_translation: Ankieta ujawniła zaskakujące wyniki.

definition: A particular procedure for accomplishing or approaching something, especially a systematic or established one.
example: They developed a new method for data analysis.
example_translation: Opracowali nową metodę analizy danych.

definition: A system of methods used in a particular area of study or activity.
example: The research was based on a new methodology.
example_translation: Badania opierały się na nowej metodologii.

definition: A way of carrying out a particular task, especially the execution or performance of an artistic work or a scientific procedure.
example: He has perfected his painting technique.
example_translation: Udoskonalił swoją technikę malarską.

definition: A way of dealing with something; a method.
example: They have a new approach to problem-solving.
example_translation: Mają nowe podejście do rozwiązywania problemów.

definition: A tool or device used for a particular task, especially for delicate or scientific work.
example: The laboratory is equipped with modern instruments.
example_translation: Laboratorium jest wyposażone w nowoczesne instrumenty.

definition: A thing made or adapted for a particular purpose, especially a piece of mechanical or electronic equipment.
example: They invented a new device for measuring air quality.
example_translation: Wynaleźli nowe urządzenie do pomiaru jakości powietrza.

definition: Put together to create a complete structure or system.
example: The apparatus is assembled and ready for use.
example_translation: Urządzenie jest zamontowane i gotowe do użycia.

definition: Examined for accuracy or functionality.
example: The equipment is checked regularly.
example_translation: Sprzęt jest regularnie sprawdzany.

definition: A single item or part of a set of tools or equipment.
example: This piece of apparatus is crucial for the experiment.
example_translation: Ta część urządzenia jest kluczowa dla eksperymentu.

definition: Research conducted to investigate an area or issue where little is known.
example: An exploratory study was conducted to gather preliminary data.
example_translation: Przeprowadzono badanie eksploracyjne w celu zebrania wstępnych danych.

definition: Research designed to test a hypothesis under controlled conditions.
example: They conducted an experimental study to test the new drug.
example_translation: Przeprowadzili badanie eksperymentalne, aby przetestować nowy lek.

definition: Research that examines the relationship between two or more variables.
example: The correlational study showed a link between diet and health.
example_translation: Badanie korelacyjne wykazało związek między dietą a zdrowiem.

definition: Research that is informal and not planned with strict methodology.
example: They conducted a casual study to get some initial insights.
example_translation: Przeprowadzili badanie przypadkowe, aby uzyskać wstępne wnioski.

definition: Research method involving observing subjects in their natural environment.
example: Naturalistic observation was used to study the behavior of birds in the wild.
example_translation: Badanie terenowe zostało wykorzystane do obserwacji zachowań ptaków na wolności.

definition: A method of collecting data by asking people questions.
example: The survey collected responses from over 1,000 participants.
example_translation: Badanie zebrało odpowiedzi od ponad 1000 uczestników.

definition: An in-depth analysis of a single case or situation.
example: The case study provided valuable insights into the company's strategies.
example_translation: Studium przypadku dostarczyło cennych informacji na temat strategii firmy.

definition: Research conducted over a long period to observe changes over time.
example: The longitudinal study tracked participants' health over 20 years.
example_translation: Badanie podłużne śledziło zdrowie uczestników przez 20 lat.

definition: Not able to be relied on; not known or definite.
example: The results are uncertain due to the small sample size.
example_translation: Wyniki są niepewne ze względu na małą próbkę.

definition: To alter or control the variables in a study or experiment.
example: The researcher makes changes to the environment to observe effects.
example_translation: Badacz manipuluje środowiskiem, aby obserwować efekty.

definition: Something created by humans rather than occurring naturally.
example: The experiment was conducted in an artificial setting.
example_translation: Eksperyment przeprowadzono w sztucznych warunkach.

word: Do in exactly the same way
definition: To repeat a study or experiment to confirm results.
example: The scientist replicated the study to verify the findings.
example_translation: Naukowiec zreplikował badanie, aby zweryfikować wyniki.

definition: To prove that a hypothesis or belief is incorrect.
example: The study aimed to disprove the previous theory.
example_translation: Badanie miało na celu obalenie poprzedniej teorii.

definition: A fact or situation that is observed to exist or happen.
example: The researchers studied the phenomenon of social media influence.
example_translation: Naukowcy badali zjawisko wpływu mediów społecznościowych.

definition: To change something, usually slightly.
example: Altering the variables can impact the experiment's results.
example_translation: Zakłócanie zmiennych może wpłynąć na wyniki eksperymentu.

definition: Causing something to become different.
example: Disrupting the conditions can alter the experiment's outcome.
example_translation: Zakłócanie warunków może zmienić wyniki eksperymentu.

word: Comes to conclusions on the basis of
definition: To form a conclusion or opinion based on evidence and reasoning.
example: The scientist makes inferences from the collected data.
example_translation: Naukowiec wnioskuje na podstawie zebranych danych.

definition: Including many small parts or aspects.
example: The report provides an in-depth analysis of the data.
example_translation: Raport zawiera dogłębną analizę danych.

definition: Coming before the main part or item.
example: Preliminary results suggest the hypothesis is correct.
example_translation: Wstępne wyniki sugerują, że hipoteza jest poprawna.

definition: An element, feature, or factor that is liable to change.
example: Temperature is a key variable in the experiment.
example_translation: Temperatura jest kluczową zmienną w eksperymencie.

definition: Conditions that are regulated to ensure accuracy and reliability.
example: The experiment was conducted under controlled conditions.
example_translation: Eksperyment przeprowadzono w kontrolowanych warunkach.

definition: The variable being tested and measured in an experiment.
example: The dependent variable in this study is the plant's growth.
example_translation: Zmienną zależną w tym badaniu jest wzrost rośliny.

definition: To show, express, or be a sign of something.
example: The results reflect the participants' true feelings.
example_translation: Wyniki odzwierciedlają prawdziwe uczucia uczestników.

definition: Efforts made to find out or establish something.
example: The study makes attempts to determine the causes of climate change.
example_translation: Badanie podejmuje próby określenia przyczyn zmian klimatycznych.

definition: To connect or associate in an organized and methodical manner.
example: The research relates different variables in systematic ways.
example_translation: Badanie odnosi różne zmienne w systematyczny sposób.

definition: To establish the truth or validity of something by evidence or argument.
example: The experiment aims to prove the hypothesis.
example_translation: Eksperyment ma na celu udowodnienie hipotezy.

definition: To prove that something is false or incorrect.
example: The study attempts to disprove the theory.
example_translation: Badanie próbuje obalić teorię.

definition: A relationship where one event (the cause) makes another event happen (the effect).
example: The study investigates the cause-and-effect relationship between stress and health.
example_translation: Badanie bada związek przyczynowo-skutkowy między stresem a zdrowiem.

definition: To watch or notice something carefully.
example: The researcher observes behavior patterns in children.
example_translation: Badacz obserwuje wzorce zachowań u dzieci.

definition: To make a written or electronic record of something.
example: The scientist records the temperature every hour.
example_translation: Naukowiec rejestruje temperaturę co godzinę.

definition: The environment where something naturally occurs.
example: The study was conducted in a natural setting to observe animal behavior.
example_translation: Badanie przeprowadzono w naturalnym otoczeniu, aby obserwować zachowania zwierząt.

definition: Individuals or things that are being studied or experimented upon.
example: The subjects of the experiment were college students.
example_translation: Podmiotami eksperymentu byli studenci college'u.

definition: Taking a lot of time to do or complete.
example: The research project was time-consuming but rewarding.
example_translation: Projekt badawczy był pochłaniający czas, ale satysfakcjonujący.

definition: To cause disorder or turmoil.
example: Construction noise is disrupting our meeting.
example_translation: Hałas z budowy zakłóca nasze spotkanie.

definition: A failure to understand something correctly.
example: There was a misunderstanding about the meeting time.
example_translation: Doszło do nieporozumienia co do czasu spotkania.

definition: Errors or mistakes in the data.
example: The report had several inaccuracies in the data.
example_translation: Raport zawierał kilka nieścisłości w danych.

definition: A person who observes but is not involved in the activity.
example: An outside observer might not understand the context.
example_translation: Zewnętrzny obserwator może nie rozumieć kontekstu.

definition: A small part or quantity intended to show what the whole is like.
example: We tested a sample of the water for contamination.
example_translation: Przetestowaliśmy próbkę wody pod kątem zanieczyszczeń.

definition: As time passes.
example: The effects will become more apparent over time.
example_translation: Z biegiem czasu efekty staną się bardziej widoczne.

definition: Typical of a class, group, or body of opinion.
example: The survey was conducted with a representative sample.
example_translation: Badanie przeprowadzono na reprezentatywnej próbie.

definition: All the inhabitants of a particular area or group.
example: The population of the city has grown rapidly.
example_translation: Populacja miasta gwałtownie wzrosła.

definition: To collect outcomes or data.
example: We need to gather results from all the tests.
example_translation: Musimy zebrać wyniki wszystkich testów.

definition: To organize and carry out.
example: We will conduct a survey to gather feedback.
example_translation: Przeprowadzimy ankietę, aby zebrać opinie.

definition: The act of showing or displaying data in a structured format.
example: Presenting data clearly is crucial for analysis.
example_translation: Prezentowanie danych w sposób przejrzysty jest kluczowe dla analizy.

definition: In a way that is brief and to the point.
example: He explained the results concisely.
example_translation: Wyjaśnił wyniki stożkowo.

definition: Visual representations of data or information.
example: The figures and diagrams helped clarify the report.
example_translation: Rysunki i diagramy pomogły wyjaśnić raport.

definition: Happens or takes place.
example: An error occurs when the program fails to run.
example_translation: Błąd występuje, gdy program nie uruchamia się.

definition: The great size or extent of something.
example: The magnitude of the earthquake was 7.0 on the Richter scale.
example_translation: Wielkość trzęsienia ziemi wynosiła 7,0 w skali Richtera.

definition: A class in a system of classification determined by size or magnitude.
example: The estimates are within an order of magnitude of each other.

definition: The process of using mathematics to find an answer.

definition: Approximately correct or within a close range.

definition: Recommended or suggested.

definition: Reached a conclusion or solution.

definition: To sum or calculate the total.

definition: To correspond or agree with the total.

definition: To remove an amount from a total.

definition: An approximate calculation or judgment.
example: Make a rough guess of how many people will come.

word: Approximately the same = in the right area
definition: Close to or similar in amount or value.
example: The two estimates are in the right area.

example: Show your workings to explain how you got the answer.

definition: Adjust the number 6.66 to the nearest whole number.
example: Round up 6.66 to 7.
example_translation: Zaokrąglij 6,66 do 7.

definition: A long essay on a particular subject, especially one written for a university degree.

definition: To recognize or point out the difference between similar things.

word: A third of the number of

example: The company needs skilled workers.
example_translation: Firma potrzebuje wykwalifikowanych pracowników.

definition: Having some training or skills, but not at a high level.
example: The factory employs semi-skilled laborers.
example_translation: Fabryka zatrudnia średnio wykwalifikowanych pracowników.

definition: Not having or requiring special skills or training.
example: The job requires unskilled labor.
example_translation: Praca wymaga niewykwalifikowanej siły roboczej.

definition: A graph depicting the normal distribution of data, shaped like a bell.
example: The test scores followed a bell curve.
example_translation: Wyniki testów układały się w krzywą dzwonową.

definition: To differ or move away from a set course or norm.
example: The results deviate from the expected pattern.
example_translation: Wyniki odbiegają od oczekiwanego wzoru.

definition: A measure of the amount of variation or dispersion in a set of values.
example: The standard deviation of the test scores was 5 points.
example_translation: Odchylenie standardowe wyników testu wyniosło 5 punktów.

definition: The range or scope of something.
example: We need to determine the extent of the damage.
example_translation: Musimy określić zakres szkód.

definition: To make certain that something will occur or be the case.
example: Please ensure that all lights are turned off before you leave.
example_translation: Proszę upewnić się, że wszystkie światła są wyłączone przed wyjściem.

definition: Having a sound basis in logic or fact; reasonable or cogent.
example: The ticket is valid for one month.
example_translation: Bilet jest ważny przez jeden miesiąc.

definition: Consistently good in quality or performance; able to be trusted.
example: He is a reliable employee.
example_translation: Jest niezawodnym pracownikiem.

definition: Acting or done in the same way over time, especially so as to be fair or accurate.
example: Her results are consistent across all tests.
example_translation: Jej wyniki są spójne we wszystkich testach.

definition: A function that represents the distribution of many random variables as a symmetrical bell-shaped graph.
example: The data follows a normal distribution.
example_translation: Dane podążają za rozkładem normalnym.

definition: A collection of related sets of information composed of separate elements.
example: We analyzed a set of data from various sources.
example_translation: Analizowaliśmy zbiór danych z różnych źródeł.

definition: The arithmetic average of a set of values.
example: The mean score of the test was 75.
example_translation: Średnia wyniku testu wyniosła 75.

definition: Without method or conscious decision; indiscriminately.
example: The participants were selected at random.
example_translation: Uczestnicy zostali wybrani losowo.

definition: A variable whose values depend on outcomes of a random phenomenon.
example: X is a random variable representing the number of heads in a coin toss.
example_translation: X to zmienna losowa reprezentująca liczbę orłów w rzucie monetą.

definition: The possible results of an experiment or event.
example: We need to evaluate the outcomes of the study.
example_translation: Musimy ocenić wyniki badania.

definition: A function that describes the likelihood of obtaining the possible values of a random variable.
example: The probability distribution for rolling a die is uniform.
example_translation: Rozkład prawdopodobieństwa rzutu kostką jest jednolity.

definition: A part, share, or number considered in comparative relation to a whole.
example: A large proportion of the students passed the exam.
example_translation: Duża część studentów zdała egzamin.

definition: The quantitative relation between two amounts, showing the number of times one value is contained within the other.
example: The ratio of teachers to students is 1:20.
example_translation: Stosunek nauczycieli do uczniów wynosi 1:20.

definition: The amount of space that a substance or object occupies, or that is enclosed within a container.
example: The volume of the box is 3 cubic meters.
example_translation: Objętość pudełka wynosi 3 metry sześcienne.

definition: To differ from an established course or norm.
example: The experiment's results deviate from the original hypothesis.
example_translation: Wyniki eksperymentu różnią się od pierwotnej hipotezy.

definition: To differ from the average or standard.
example: His behavior deviates from the norm.
example_translation: Jego zachowanie odbiega od normy.

definition: A measure of the amount of variation or dispersion in a set of values from the average.
example: A low standard deviation indicates that the data points tend to be close to the mean.
example_translation: Niskie odchylenie standardowe wskazuje, że punkty danych mają tendencję do zbliżania się do średniej.

translation: connections, often as cause and effect
definition: Mutual relationships or connections between two or more things.
example: There are strong correlations between smoking and lung cancer.
example_translation: Istnieją silne powiązania między paleniem a rakiem płuc.

definition: A subset of a population selected for measurement or observation.
example: The sample consisted of 200 individuals from various age groups.
example_translation: Próbka składała się z 200 osób z różnych grup wiekowych.

definition: Acting or done in the same way over time.
example: Her performance was consistent throughout the season.
example_translation: Jej występ był spójny przez cały sezon.

definition: In a way that is sufficiently great or important to be worthy of attention.
example: The new policy significantly improved company morale.
example_translation: Nowa polityka znacznie poprawiła morale firmy.

definition: A set of principles or beliefs on the basis of which opinions are formed.
example: From a legal standpoint, the case is clear.
example_translation: Z punktu widzenia prawa sprawa jest jasna.

definition: Believing that there should be extreme political or social change.
example: He has radical views on economic reform.
example_translation: Ma radykalne poglądy na temat reformy gospodarczej.

definition: (Disapproving) Opposed to political or social change or new ideas.
example: The government is often criticized for its reactionary policies.
example_translation: Rząd jest często krytykowany za swoje reakcyjne polityki.

definition: Not inclined to trust change, especially if it is sudden.
example: His conservative approach to business was very successful.
example_translation: Jego konserwatywne podejście do biznesu było bardzo udane.

definition: (Disapproving) Lacking in experience; opposite is mature.
example: His behavior was very immature for his age.
example_translation: Jego zachowanie było bardzo niedojrzałe jak na jego wiek.

definition: Not influenced by personal beliefs or attitudes, based only on facts; opposite is subjective.
example: An objective analysis of the data was conducted.
example_translation: Przeprowadzono obiektywną analizę danych.

definition: In a way that is influenced by personal beliefs or attitudes.
example: She viewed the situation subjectively.
example_translation: Oceniła sytuację subiektywnie.

definition: Not supporting one person or group more than others.
example: The judge must remain impartial during the trial.
example_translation: Sędzia musi pozostać bezstronny podczas procesu.

definition: Showing an unreasonable liking for something based on personal beliefs or opinions; opposite is biased against.
example: The article was biased in favour of the new policy.
example_translation: Artykuł był uprzedzony na korzyść nowej polityki.

definition: Showing unreasonable dislike for, based on personal beliefs or opinions (stronger and more pejorative than biased); opposite is prejudiced in favour of.
example: He was prejudiced against people from different cultures.
example_translation: Był uprzedzony wobec ludzi z różnych kultur.

definition: Based only on reason; opposite is irrational.
example: She made a rational decision after considering all the facts.
example_translation: Podjęła racjonalną decyzję po rozważeniu wszystkich faktów.

definition: A theory or set of beliefs or principles, particularly one on which a political system or organization is based.
example: The party's ideology is rooted in socialism.
example_translation: Ideologia partii jest zakorzeniona w socjalizmie.

definition: A set of beliefs that is much more thoughtful and serious.
example: His philosophy on life was shaped by his experiences.
example_translation: Jego filozofia życiowa została ukształtowana przez doświadczenia.

definition: To have opinions.
example: She holds strong views on environmental issues.
example_translation: Ma silne poglądy na temat kwestii środowiskowych.

definition: To take a position on a particular issue.
example: The company has adopted a strong stance on sustainability.
example_translation: Firma przyjęła zdecydowane stanowisko w sprawie zrównoważonego rozwoju.
